Package org.github.stevemorse.disnlpbot

Class AppendingObjectOutputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
java.io.ObjectOutputStream
org.github.stevemorse.disnlpbot.AppendingObjectOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.io.ObjectOutput, java.io.ObjectStreamConstants, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class AppendingObjectOutputStream
extends java.io.ObjectOutputStream
The AppendingObjectOutputStream overrides the writeStreamHeader method so that it does not write a new file header when used to write again to a serialized file
Version:
1.0
Author:
Steve Morse
